reckv0qCxJ6DS7XqX.title: Extra Storage
reckv0qCxJ6DS7XqX.desc: Cargo containers are enlarged, allowing better storage.

reclHnQYcIzIv52iE.title: Yrg Drone Apex Crystal
reclHnQYcIzIv52iE.desc: An arcane crystal that allows the use of complex mental commands on bound Yrg drones, making their work more effective.

recpTIjv7hdZq4yTF.title: The Looking Glass
recpTIjv7hdZq4yTF.desc: A long spyglass, made of bronze, probably of Dwarvish design. A treasure in the hands of a vigilant /vagrus/.

recpczfhbQku4l4R6.title: Slave Cages
recpczfhbQku4l4R6.desc: Carts are equipped with cages for unruly slaves.

recquAu9SMfdFuTtU.title: Reinforced Wheels and Axles
recquAu9SMfdFuTtU.desc: Reinforced cartwheels with axles made of iron.

recsUtafhSKijoUyG.title: Dragonsteel Armaments
recsUtafhSKijoUyG.desc: Weapons and shields for your fighters, forged of magnificent Dragonsteel.

recvBJQM0RCCwiTEM.title: Perimeter Alarms
recvBJQM0RCCwiTEM.desc: Set up during camp, these improvised traps and alarms that will wake your crew once triggered by a furtive ambusher.

recvaFgpgWVuiDHjT.title: Exquisite Tools
recvaFgpgWVuiDHjT.desc: Tools crafted of metal. These make the life of your workers much easier.

recx9wU82uqbu2tBi.title: Steel Armaments
recx9wU82uqbu2tBi.desc: Weapons and shields for your fighters, made of steel.

recyTEgeiRZDUK2ur.title: Dowsing Rod
recyTEgeiRZDUK2ur.desc: A magical rod that can find water in even the harshest of wastelands.

recziLcdY1CShOF0Y.title: Hidden Compartments
recziLcdY1CShOF0Y.desc: Hidden nooks and crannies in the cargo containers to hide 'problematic' goods.

rec0PJS50UCNgOJk8.title: Hides
rec0PJS50UCNgOJk8.desc: Leather form the hides of beasts, ideal for clothing, armor, and tools alike.

rec248iKXdVJgF0Pz.title: Ivory
rec248iKXdVJgF0Pz.desc: Beast fangs and tusks that can be fashioned into tools or ornaments. A common but valuable resource.

rec3UJXq7JYTSMMg6.title: Jade
rec3UJXq7JYTSMMg6.desc: A green-colored ornamental mineral. Fairly sturdy and fashionable.

rec3hNlvpTZWcOVGE.title: Dyes
rec3hNlvpTZWcOVGE.desc: A common dye for clothing, transported in a sealed clay jar.

rec4jGY1DuRFd3cJj.title: Dried Fruit
rec4jGY1DuRFd3cJj.desc: Fruit harvested in a sun-drenched oasis and dried in large quantities to last much longer.

rec57pmCwwfR0oLJl.title: Oil
rec57pmCwwfR0oLJl.desc: Since its discovery and industrialization, the viscous, dark substance has become one of the most desired fuels on the continent.

rec8c3mGenemNiWab.title: Grain
rec8c3mGenemNiWab.desc: A clay amphora full of grain. Fairly rare since the Calamity, as the changed world does not support its cultivation.

recBpRdiS24KqWIAV.title: Linen
recBpRdiS24KqWIAV.desc: Textile manufactured from flax plant that still grows in some regions.

recHk3MurPB26y3sg.title: Scrap Metal
recHk3MurPB26y3sg.desc: Random pieces of old metal, can still be smelted down to find iron and other metals in them.

recKRuoNm7Zgh72OX.title: Mushroom Beer
recKRuoNm7Zgh72OX.desc: A common alcoholic beverage brewed from common mushrooms.

recLWsZHvYDgdtbvJ.title: Silver
recLWsZHvYDgdtbvJ.desc: The second most valuable precious metal smelted down into bars.

recN8gzoUYmBHdTx8.title: Herbs
recN8gzoUYmBHdTx8.desc: Dried and cut plants often used by healers, quacks, and medicine men. Or to make tea.

recPm13yMwvQU9ny8.title: Ceruleus Crystal
recPm13yMwvQU9ny8.desc: Pale blue crystal cut and prepared for craftsmen's work. The most common type, used for both arcane and mundane crafting.

recPmVA2LzYxfCjRh.title: Obsidian Blades
recPmVA2LzYxfCjRh.desc: Dark, glass-like volcanic rock fashioned into blades, arrowheads, and spearheads in a stack. In a metal-starved world, obsidian is a popular material.

recPwgmofvMMOlpOo.title: Iron
recPwgmofvMMOlpOo.desc: Iron ore smelted into bars. Though fairly common pre-Calamity, iron is a rarity these days and is thus very valuable.

recSD8bVqrTgbZr4p.title: Supplies
recSD8bVqrTgbZr4p.desc: A bundle of supplies enough to cover one Consumption. Bread from root grain with vegetables or mushrooms. A bit of dried meat if you are lucky.

recT2U3dpSkkFdwUE.title: Brightkelp
recT2U3dpSkkFdwUE.desc: Dried, phosphorescent kelp from Everdark. It burns for hours with a white, strong light.

recTEkx5wLtIZ8jYc.title: Coffee Beans
recTEkx5wLtIZ8jYc.desc: Dark, bitter, hard beans from Tark. The coffee made from it is sought after all around the continent.

recWRruWj1FBXxyuL.title: Bronze
recWRruWj1FBXxyuL.desc: An alloy from tin and copper, bronze is fairly common compared to other metals in the post-Calamity era, yet still considered rare and valuable.

recWW9hdxAUkCYKEb.title: Timber
recWW9hdxAUkCYKEb.desc: In a world of infertile wastelands, timber is a valuable commodity used for tools and luxury items only.

recYM7wFGRYThprzH.title: Tin
recYM7wFGRYThprzH.desc: A soft, malleable, silver-white metal used in many alloys.

recYdvMj1e8I4BGAt.title: Mushrooms
recYdvMj1e8I4BGAt.desc: A sack of dried mushrooms. Very popular as an ingredient for food and drinks due to its wide availability.

recZEYcSAwjkDgYou.title: Spice
recZEYcSAwjkDgYou.desc: Exotic spice for cooking. Very handy in a world where common food is fairly tasteless or disgusting.

recZXoc8PLd4kE12Y.title: Bone
recZXoc8PLd4kE12Y.desc: Less sturdy than ivory but still valuable in a world where metal and wood are scarce.

recbL3tQzIsSlh096.title: Wine
recbL3tQzIsSlh096.desc: Wine derived from something other than grape, yet is still reminiscent of old Bachas' sacred drink.

recdx0JjD6vdixFAT.title: Chitin
recdx0JjD6vdixFAT.desc: The protective hide of giant insects that dwell on the continent are sought after by craftsmen and armorers alike.

recfhjKH6Naa6hJxO.title: Copper
recfhjKH6Naa6hJxO.desc: The most common metal in the metal-starved world. Still rare and very valuable.

rechRKpxevh7ruX1i.title: Luxury Wine
rechRKpxevh7ruX1i.desc: Luxurious wine from the foot of Mount Xyn, where the sun still shines on grape.

rechYRJ12wqPkzHDp.title: Salt
rechYRJ12wqPkzHDp.desc: The most well-known spice, often mined at great effort.

rechxYJBd6VP8jBlS.title: Obsidian
rechxYJBd6VP8jBlS.desc: Pieces of the black, glassy volcanic rock, which is a common material in the metal-starved world.

rechyF5dDvhplymtK.title: Marble
rechyF5dDvhplymtK.desc: A type of limestone commonly used for sculpture and building material. Used to be the most popular in pre-Calamity times.

recnzbVM5u3q6psNg.title: Pottery
recnzbVM5u3q6psNg.desc: Jugs, bowls, pitchers, mugs, amphorae, and whatever else can be fashioned from clay.

recqWIj1yHJeGWxFG.title: Bogweed
recqWIj1yHJeGWxFG.desc: When smoked, bogweed makes one relaxed and gleeful. Sought after throughout the known world.

recqw2K7UJ5vpVRTy.title: Coal
recqw2K7UJ5vpVRTy.desc: Essential to smelting and a slew of other industries, coal is mined near the western mountains and the eastern swamps.

recrde5mR6ul8NAZL.title: Dragonbone
recrde5mR6ul8NAZL.desc: The bones of dragons are not only potent spell components but are also amazing materials for tools and weapons, as they are lighter than metal but just as sturdy.

recx3vxs52hTwzt49.title: Dragonsteel Scraps
recx3vxs52hTwzt49.desc: The best quality metal in the known world, as it was forged in Dragon fire. Each piece is worth a fortune.

recxHRchy0bjHfgrq.title: Flavo Crystal
recxHRchy0bjHfgrq.desc: Faded yellow crystals cut and prepared for craftsmen's work. Lower quality crystal but still fairly popular.

rec00wQS2OLGmwX29.title: Dragon Egg
rec00wQS2OLGmwX29.desc: A dark, leathery egg with a dead dragon embryo inside. A valuable magical component.

rec08cXDEnoltCXpT.title: Koveas' Trophy
rec08cXDEnoltCXpT.desc: The severed head of Koveas, escaped slave and pit fighter champion. Quite nasty.

rec0e3MbzggMsgsFV.title: Maekrathar’s Spirit
rec0e3MbzggMsgsFV.desc: It is said that this strong liquor invokes the irrepressible spirit of the Red Dragon Maekrathar. It was brewed from fruit growing in the Dragonlands.

rec0iwOFLU7FPHXCn.title: Aran's Bell
rec0iwOFLU7FPHXCn.desc: Burgundy flower shaped like a bell. The botanist Aran propagated it for her research but ended up as a rare spice later on.

rec1KMqtTEIcyo1i6.title: Aqua Infernis
rec1KMqtTEIcyo1i6.desc: Stark orange spirits imbued with fiery magic and piquant spices. The horn-shaped bottle is warm to the touch.

rec2F9hm1cebjLDsg.title: Sweet Yrg Nectar
rec2F9hm1cebjLDsg.desc: Nectar secreted by a Yrg Queen. Extremely sweet and very rare.

rec2iRpYzfpXHSaHN.title: Crystal Lamp
rec2iRpYzfpXHSaHN.desc: A carved lamp made of crystal, running on petty magic. Common but valuable.

rec3HsKhjZvkFQhpA.title: Tribal Trinket
rec3HsKhjZvkFQhpA.desc: Some sort of tribal bauble or ornament that might be valuable to someone, though you shouldn't get your hopes up.

rec4nkKHy7AtgxcZV.title: Rare Jewelry
rec4nkKHy7AtgxcZV.desc: Jewelry made of precious metals or other valuable materials.

rec4vqYcwdDH1e6di.title: Accursed Amulet
rec4vqYcwdDH1e6di.desc: An amulet of dark metal on a chain, depicting a snarling demon face. Carriers of it are cursed to be hunted by Demons.

rec5muUNyyDHSjyPv.title: Dwarven Gadget
rec5muUNyyDHSjyPv.desc: Some ancient Dwarven gewgaw that nobody can decipher in this age, not even Dwarves. Yet many try to, which makes it quite valuable.

rec61jinhQmwZnXE4.title: Valuable Treasure
rec61jinhQmwZnXE4.desc: A beautifully carved icon, a silver box, a pretty mirror, or something similar. May be worth quite a bit.

rec6JFX4ZX34OfUV7.title: Tarkian Spice Fusion
rec6JFX4ZX34OfUV7.desc: A set of small jars in a box, filled with rare Tarkian spices that are almost impossible to come by.

rec6WG6DU7m1Bm7K0.title: Blood of the Empress
rec6WG6DU7m1Bm7K0.desc: A magnificent silver torque embedded with two dozen rubies. The crimson radiates an uncanny sadness.

rec6XgC4He46d9Oo2.title: Imbued Masks
rec6XgC4He46d9Oo2.desc: A cheap cloth mask imbued with herbs. It is better to endure the strong smell than to die of thirst while mining salt.

rec6gHj3dSLDn4S3k.title: Potion of Quenching
rec6gHj3dSLDn4S3k.desc: A rare potion developed for desert warfare. One drop quenches thirst for a day or so.

rec6khHItAmoNBan8.title: Rare Clay
rec6khHItAmoNBan8.desc: Rare, high quality clay found in Maar Gorad's swamps. Thatmas needs this to finish his new body.

rec6uPBCYIn9dTZDH.title: Orowen's Gem
rec6uPBCYIn9dTZDH.desc: A magnificent emerald from the legendary treasure of Orowen the Elven Queen of yore.

rec7qBiUNuTIqWOIC.title: Planeswalker's Memory Crystal
rec7qBiUNuTIqWOIC.desc: Pristine memory crystal that belonged to a planeswalker in an age long past.

rec8ABZtyteO8roVQ.title: Memory Crystal
rec8ABZtyteO8roVQ.desc: A small blue crystal with a sorcerous light twinkling inside. It was used to record fragments of a memory, emotions, or sensations.

recAOA8FsYTO80y0F.title: Moondust
recAOA8FsYTO80y0F.desc: Moondust is one of the most potent and sought-after drugs of the Realms. Outlawed in most places, a bag of this silvery dust is worth quite a lot.

recBWmjgb8UBsH3tK.title: Pristine Memory Crystal
recBWmjgb8UBsH3tK.desc: A small white-blue crystal that was prepared for the sorcerous ritual of recording memories but was never used.

recBfwoHD2MmVwBwh.title: Spectral Residue
recBfwoHD2MmVwBwh.desc: Fine, greyish-blue powder that is cool to the touch. It has arcane properties, so it is sought after by magicians.

recC6GOCRM8OfmaB0.title: Dream Crystals
recC6GOCRM8OfmaB0.desc: A bunch of small, green enchanted crystals that can record a person's dreams. Given by Captain M'vuru at the Twin Towers to complete a task.

recCyfExJL1GlbV8Q.title: Common Jewel
recCyfExJL1GlbV8Q.desc: Though common, it is still worth a lot of coins.

recFgaBgL4vYbv9x4.title: Antidote
recFgaBgL4vYbv9x4.desc: Very potent antidote in a stoppered bottle.

recGr1J0U0YsrfTeX.title: Daneram's Armor
recGr1J0U0YsrfTeX.desc: An ornate /lorica musculata/ forged from silvered steel, complete with arm- and shinguards, as well as a laurel leaf crown of pure silver. Fit for a king, the set was custom made for Daneram Xevaris.

recH3qwhA7QdY06z7.title: Glowing Memory Crystal
recH3qwhA7QdY06z7.desc: This pristine memory crystal glows with a more powerful glow than most. It is as if a sprite was dancing ceaselessly inside of it.

recH7VUzTEQmzNwHF.title: Architect's Memory Crystal
recH7VUzTEQmzNwHF.desc: Pristine memory crystal that belonged to an architect of great renown in an age long past.

recIJ4G1B1JRkIMlj.title: Necromancer's Body
recIJ4G1B1JRkIMlj.desc: The embalmed body of the late Opiter Lucius Herculius.

recJ0q4vPpsglclWm.title: Sadirar Bone Necklace
recJ0q4vPpsglclWm.desc: A row of small carved bones and beast fangs on a leather strap, sometimes worn by Sadirar tribesmen.

recJvAUanfjjL2HhF.title: Cerulean Essence
recJvAUanfjjL2HhF.desc: A pale blue colored light alcoholic beverage specked with ceruleus crystal flecks. Rare and valuable due to the difficulty of its production.

recL69qHSQkLnOIwu.title: Warlock's Memory Crystal
recL69qHSQkLnOIwu.desc: Pristine memory crystal that belonged to a warlock who delved into the depths of the Sunken Tower.

recLMqvQsdZ7C48M1.title: Ambershroom
recLMqvQsdZ7C48M1.desc: A rare strain of amber-colored mushrooms grown and harvested specifically for Vorax to be used in cooking.

recLaIiYcm5VAREgv.title: Box of Rare Dragonstones
recLaIiYcm5VAREgv.desc: Allegedly, each of these fiery-red Dragonstones can topple several buildings.

recMM5M019xT9Hbs3.title: Rare Jewel
recMM5M019xT9Hbs3.desc: A true treasure, rare and extremely valuable.

recMRQJL8bv4lb4sF.title: Odd Bone Carving
recMRQJL8bv4lb4sF.desc: A piece of bone carved into twisting, serpentine shapes. Almost painful to look at. The artist must have been a madman.

recMhhFU5HLgMIfl7.title: Ahskulite Charms
recMhhFU5HLgMIfl7.desc: Magical charms enchanted by Ahskul's priests. They attract most kinds of Undead for a brief period of time and so can be used to lure them away.

recNVLTHdFUXWlPxv.title: Congregated Trophy
recNVLTHdFUXWlPxv.desc: The white ash of the undead abomination collected into a huge sack. What will it prove?

recNqUtDS33dHMkzc.title: Glyph of the Seeker
recNqUtDS33dHMkzc.desc: A glowing, magical glyph inscribed on a scroll. Allegedly, the spell held in it is required to open the seal on the Crystal Archives of the Sunken Tower.

recOdlF4QJqSgAfGj.title: Sergorodite Arms
recOdlF4QJqSgAfGj.desc: Arms and armor gathered from the slain Sergorodite contingent.

recOg2sV9xxP33AqU.title: Tarkian Mugwort
recOg2sV9xxP33AqU.desc: Tarragon imported from Tark. A valuable spice that is quite difficult to come by in the Province and further south.

recPH5HzrZhLDCmnf.title: Simple Jewelry
recPH5HzrZhLDCmnf.desc: Simple jewelry made of bone, wood, or bronze.

recPROpXiRuHeCgcj.title: Oghre Heirlooms
recPROpXiRuHeCgcj.desc: Silver medallions and weapons made of crystal that belonged to Oghres.

recQa5930NsK5J7G4.title: Jade Figurine
recQa5930NsK5J7G4.desc: An elegant figurine carved from beautiful jade. Could fetch quite a price.

recRsZRBS2ja4KXRv.title: Varotian Memory Crystal
recRsZRBS2ja4KXRv.desc: Pristine memory crystal that belonged to a Varotian envoy who visited the Sunken Tower in an age long past.

recSiBrlveekBioRY.title: Rhak'Tar's Goods
recSiBrlveekBioRY.desc: Whatever is in the box, the Orc wants it delivered to him posthaste.

recTJTbFFQvE1vFIL.title: Arcane Text
recTJTbFFQvE1vFIL.desc: A scroll or book filled with arcane symbols. Valuable to users of magic.

recTUNb4UQC4dYMUC.title: Wraithgrass
recTUNb4UQC4dYMUC.desc: A ghostly white plant that grows in hidden caverns of Everdark. Dried and ground into a powder used to spice certain meals.

recTlrog932Eg3Z1h.title: Diary of Narma
recTlrog932Eg3Z1h.desc: Leather-bound diary of Narma, the last superintendent of the Study Halls in the Sunken Tower. It has notes on how to access the Lecture Halls.

recU5tag4zhggPTmV.title: Bronze Statue
recU5tag4zhggPTmV.desc: A smaller statue made of bronze, depicting some forgotten deity or other. Nothing to write home about, but it could be melted down and fashioned into arrowheads and daggers.

recVW3ldvG8mHxIWU.title: Praeceptor's Memory Crystal
recVW3ldvG8mHxIWU.desc: Pristine memory crystal that belonged to a Praeceptor of Crystal Studies at the Sunken Tower in an age long past.

recVjbCSl1ve5Da9d.title: Sand Wyrm Trophy
recVjbCSl1ve5Da9d.desc: A trophy claimed from a Sand Wyrm. Can fetch a fine price where these creatures appear in large numbers.

recWwMzMxCTzxAacs.title: Custodis
recWwMzMxCTzxAacs.desc: A small book bound in green leather. It has been firmly on the Imperial blacklist for over a century. Perhaps the authorities would be interested?

recXxtZmGJTQ5AsQ1.title: Silver Laurel
recXxtZmGJTQ5AsQ1.desc: A laurel leaf crown of pure silver. It used to belong to Daneram Xevaris.

recYK3kutmD7wHh99.title: Pristine Trophy
recYK3kutmD7wHh99.desc: A trophy claimed from a great beast or Calamity-touched monster. Can fetch a good price in cities.

recYrJuPZpmGDoJdW.title: Beast Lures
recYrJuPZpmGDoJdW.desc: Lures prepared to attract all manner of predators. Ideal to lure beasts away from you or into a trap even.

recZB9Ml8HSkQ3UxL.title: Imbued Key
recZB9Ml8HSkQ3UxL.desc: Magically imbued silver key that opens the way into the library. It used to belong to the captain of the honor guard garrisoned at the Sunken Tower.

recapMdlTWatlMs3u.title: Ulalud
recapMdlTWatlMs3u.desc: A fruity alcoholic beverage brewed by Vitrar shamans. Rare and valuable, said to induce livid dreams.

recbAg3P3r5yThdi5.title: Exquisite Weapon
recbAg3P3r5yThdi5.desc: A weapon of great craftsmanship. It will fetch quite a price from the right buyer.

recbOebiZWE5I375z.title: Demon Horn
recbOebiZWE5I375z.desc: Still warm to the touch, the horn is yellow and curved with a pointy end. Valuable to sorcerers.

reccEmVh8j3tcdTrV.title: Spell of Opening
reccEmVh8j3tcdTrV.desc: A scroll with a spell inscribed upon it. This will open a specific magical seal: the way into the Dormitories of the Sunken Tower.

recdiHzyirr7SgOek.title: Memory Crystal of the Visit
recdiHzyirr7SgOek.desc: Pristine memory crystal that a student at the Sunken Tower recorded during the visit of an Apostle in an age long past.

recdpWTagOiUMRaaX.title: Socketed Golden Amulet
recdpWTagOiUMRaaX.desc: A golden chain and amulet with a socket for a large energy crystal. Thatmas needs this to finish his new body.

recepDvGq9ErhvcSn.title: Pure White Crystal
recepDvGq9ErhvcSn.desc: A pulsating, pure white crystal formation the size of a fist. Its white light is mesmerizing.

recfdeZsTkV1ZFCGd.title: Luminalirium
recfdeZsTkV1ZFCGd.desc: A bottle of rare, luminescent spirits made from brightkelp. An acquired taste at best, as it is somewhat briny.

recffJTUiEe8Dl9Kx.title: Ancient Memory Crystal
recffJTUiEe8Dl9Kx.desc: This pristine memory crystal looks like it was twisted or grown into shape rather than carved. It must be many millennia old.

recjgsBaRaH9OZaNe.title: Prefectus's Package
recjgsBaRaH9OZaNe.desc: The Prefectus tasked you with delivering this unassuming, sealed package to the Overseer of the Auguros Work Camp.

recmOEo4PiMdDqzJg.title: Bejeweled Silver Chest
recmOEo4PiMdDqzJg.desc: A magnificent silver chest studded with rare jewels.

recoBrTDNdjoX4jAX.title: Slimegrass
recoBrTDNdjoX4jAX.desc: A smelly plant growing in swamps and moist caverns. Sometimes used by alchemists.

recpBVUFh4QkJ5WUl.title: Mage's Memory Crystal
recpBVUFh4QkJ5WUl.desc: Pristine memory crystal that belonged to a mage at the Sunken Tower. It might contain memories of spells and rituals.

recpDrM3o6AjbXmGK.title: Outlaw Trophy
recpDrM3o6AjbXmGK.desc: Trophies collected from wanted outlaws. Grisly but may be profitable if presented to the authorities.

recpM7ixlrJH44DqV.title: Marble Statuette
recpM7ixlrJH44DqV.desc: A deftly sculpted piece of marble. Perhaps a household god or the likeness of a pretty daughter? It will fetch a good price.

recpP3HCh3czZ2c2V.title: Imbued Jhakra Alpha Stomach
recpP3HCh3czZ2c2V.desc: The huge third stomach of a Jhakra Alpha imbued with divine ichor and preserved by Vorax's necromantic incantation.

recsgZSdp8BrxQXDg.title: Phaeras' Chest
recsgZSdp8BrxQXDg.desc: A small but sturdy chest filled with Drakka. You were tasked with handling it by Phaeras the Jeweler.

rect3r0XPGK3dq4dW.title: Dampsmoke
rect3r0XPGK3dq4dW.desc: Incense made from slimegrass. The horrid smell is difficult to stomach but it masks your presence from Yrgs with great effect.

rectxyN3zzDZuKmRv.title: Salt Mining Token
rectxyN3zzDZuKmRv.desc: A small pearlescent token you have to hand in on site to get permission from the Scythichnis Covenant to mine salt in Brine Mere.

recuDYi1C90IDA05p.title: Goradian Absinthe
recuDYi1C90IDA05p.desc: Rare spirits brewed from select herbs from noxious Maar Gorad. The green liquid is kept in a thick glass bottle.

recvTkkvIZKh353nm.title: Memory Crystal of Parhassus
recvTkkvIZKh353nm.desc: A memory crystal that belonged to High Praeceptor Parhassus of the Sunken Tower. Its secrets may reveal a way into the Star Garden.

recwFxwBfpNHV3SKD.title: Medical Supplies
recwFxwBfpNHV3SKD.desc: Potions, tinctures, concoctions, draughts, dried healing herbs, bandages, and all sorts of other medicine in a nice pack.

recx5tXihTBhEjE48.title: Ritual Materials
recx5tXihTBhEjE48.desc: Components for magical scrying. Given by Captain M'vuru at the Twin Towers to complete a task.

recxBa6O8zx5W3u3W.title: Jhakra Alpha Trophy
recxBa6O8zx5W3u3W.desc: A gigantic, rotting Jhakra head. Fairly difficult to carry.

recyOfsufhVGQVEpp.title: Shalimi Spirit Charm
recyOfsufhVGQVEpp.desc: Bones, feathers, and carven tokens bound together, blessed by Shalimi magic. It is suppsed to repel Sand Wyrms, albeit only once.

recyekLgYM0NMhywR.title: Ancient Tablet
recyekLgYM0NMhywR.desc: Stone inscribed with text from the pre-Calamity world. May contain valuable knowledge.

reczCJuST83B4Xo5N.title: Bibliothecaris Prefectus Scepter
reczCJuST83B4Xo5N.desc: Bejewelled scepter of the head librarian of the Sunken Tower. It is required to open the seal on the Crystal Archives of the Sunken Tower.

reczVErE1zW3nmto1.title: Wanderer's Memory Crystal
reczVErE1zW3nmto1.desc: Pristine memory crystal that belonged to a wanderer of the continent long before the Calamity.

reczthbyMC3Sr9qP5.title: Transcendent Mirth
reczthbyMC3Sr9qP5.desc: The humor of a God, collected in a stoppered silver flask. Faint amusement and distant laughter can be felt around it.

rec0UIszfFBrk5DR6.title: Torture Devices
rec0UIszfFBrk5DR6.desc: Tools of certain trades are especially gruesome. These are used to make unwilling people talk when in the right hands.

rec38VNfn9Ziwr2vQ.title: Morgarthan's Gaol
rec38VNfn9Ziwr2vQ.desc: A dark metal amulet on a chain. The snarling Demon face is alive, scowling in pain and anger and no wonder: the sorceress Nedir imprisoned the essence of the Demon Lord Morgarthan into the jewel.

rec3uKmS4G0SX8cMz.title: Candle of the Dead
rec3uKmS4G0SX8cMz.desc: Black candle carved to look like a hooded skeleton and blessed by the priests of Ahskul, God of the Underworld. When lit, it protects the bearer from harmful magic.

rec4TyZdjN2dgpLBu.title: Greater Luck Talisman
rec4TyZdjN2dgpLBu.desc: A small talisman to bring you luck. This was supposed to be blessed by the spirits or some lesser deity.

rec5ccD6bCnb6fIH1.title: Amulet of Protection
rec5ccD6bCnb6fIH1.desc: A green gemstone set in a bronze pendant. The magic sealed into the amulet creates an invisible shield around the wearer that deflects some attacks thrown at them.

rec6475CKcGNMYiW4.title: Spirit Idol
rec6475CKcGNMYiW4.desc: A small statuette carved by Thatmas, bathed in growth magic, embedded with enchanted crystals, and inhabited by an ancient spirit. It is certainly alive. Can it be considered sentient?

rec79euHcY6fk1ILI.title: Orcish Terror Totem
rec79euHcY6fk1ILI.desc: Orcs are known to carry these tribal emblems when going to war. Their horrific visage of bones, skin, and spikes strike fear in their enemies.

rec7Eiy66PcUdqkdK.title: Scabbard of Valahuir
rec7Eiy66PcUdqkdK.desc: An ornate, slender scabbard, reputedly belonging to the Elven warrior of legend. It is said that blades kept in it are always sharp and find the weak points of one's enemies. That did not save its mythical owner, it seems.

rec8hcJsyfh449dT9.title: Ring of Leeching
rec8hcJsyfh449dT9.desc: The dreadful Nosferatis Sisterhood creates these arcane rings for coven members. Reputedly carved from a child's neck-bone, the ring transfers dubious energies to those that cause harm while wearing it.

recAPiwOzeOslHg3Z.title: Shadow Talisman
recAPiwOzeOslHg3Z.desc: An obsidian talisman of the deepest black. The wearer's silouette becomes blurred and shadowy whenever they are attacked, making them more difficult to hit.

recB989mgwaGxYIm6.title: Unwavering Vengeance
recB989mgwaGxYIm6.desc: Prayerbook of Sergorod covered in black leather, blessed by a High Priest. Resplendent with stories, parables, and psalms of vengeance. It is said to guide one's wrath.

recCyOJOtHkhrLYcS.title: Dragonstone of Clairvoyance
recCyOJOtHkhrLYcS.desc: An amber gem that fits your palm. A pale light emanates from its core. Dragonstones are made using Dragon magic. This one allows the user to see glimpses of the future.

recDmuuibBaM8l6Ln.title: Bronze Owl Pendant
recDmuuibBaM8l6Ln.desc: A tiny, dark bronze trinket in the form of an owl, a creature of legends. It is said that the wearer can see in darkness and that their shots rarely miss their target.

recDoafLIuIHoRbiF.title: Windwalker Talisman
recDoafLIuIHoRbiF.desc: A talisman blessed by Wind Spirit to shield the bearer from harm. Creates a temporary wall of wind to swipe away attacks.

recE7wU0CHDzobtZy.title: Herbalist Tools
recE7wU0CHDzobtZy.desc: Two bone sickles of varying sizes, small knives, containers and pouches, mortar and pestle - the tools of a trained herbalist in one leather sling bag.

recEaMgEUt4LriKy5.title: Quildan Hyath
recEaMgEUt4LriKy5.desc: Slender boots of Elven design and craftsmanship, one of the lost treasures of the Elder Races. The wearer makes almost no sound when moving about carefully.

recHbHNaiWhN2FyoK.title: Small Energy Crystal
recHbHNaiWhN2FyoK.desc: One of the most common items created by Crystalmancy. This palm-sized pale blue crystal contains arcane energies that the user can tap into and use for spells.

recHjF0jf04NRE3K4.title: Smoldering Heart
recHjF0jf04NRE3K4.desc: Not an actual heart but some kind of a living mineral lump emitting heat and fiery light. Its properties empower the one holding it.

recJu84tO72TndPZ9.title: Dragonstone of Teleportation
recJu84tO72TndPZ9.desc: An opal orb that fits your palm. Strange energies swirl under its multi-colored surface. Dragonstones are made using Dragon magic. This one allows the user to teleport in line of sight.

recKUV1WxerNaPpMt.title: The Horn of Vrakarnath
recKUV1WxerNaPpMt.desc: Fashioned form the horn of the fabled Red Dragon, the relic is said to grant Draconic protection while its blare strikes fear into the heart of their enemies.

recLfeC79qzSe5JSZ.title: Vernius Matriarch Skull
recLfeC79qzSe5JSZ.desc: The skull of Galantia Vernia, matriarch of the Vernius noble family who all died in a tragic accident. Imbued with potent necromantic magic due to the cold, neverending hatred of the slain old woman.

recMfV8fxZMNOEJ5o.title: Luck Talisman
recMfV8fxZMNOEJ5o.desc: A small talisman to bring you luck. A lot of people carry one but do they believe in it?

recO23716ujv5nemk.title: Urd Rune
recO23716ujv5nemk.desc: A piece of stone salvaged from something much larger. The rune on it is still charged with ancient Dwarven magic, protecting and stabilizing the bearer.

recOuon7iYvwBDZhu.title: Survival Kit
recOuon7iYvwBDZhu.desc: A small backpack with simple but well-crafted tools, remedies, and supplies that aid an already trained individual in outdoors survival. Even in the cursed wastelands.

recOyWlIdd0I947na.title: Manticore Broche
recOyWlIdd0I947na.desc: Given to the best agents of Stinger Lords, this golden broche was imbued with the malice of manticores - a lethal boon in case of imminent adversity.

recPoa6r3kfpptAMO.title: Potent Poison
recPoa6r3kfpptAMO.desc: Very strong poison in a jar. The viscous, dark green slime gives off a sour stench and can be applied to weapons.

recRDKgQaqLLKalf3.title: Radiant Crystal Idol
recRDKgQaqLLKalf3.desc: Magnificent crystal idol depicting an angel". The overcharged energies locked inside the winged relic can be tapped to protect the bearer from fear and harm."

recRctobvKsbIupO6.title: Malformed Dagger
recRctobvKsbIupO6.desc: An iron throwing dagger that looks melted and malformed. Very heavy and cold to the touch. Allegedly, the malevolent essence of Hashatar's Prince is imprisoned in the now useless weapon.

recSX971XA08Fut7Z.title: Dragonstone of Enchantment
recSX971XA08Fut7Z.desc: A magnificently-carved amethyst that fits your palm. A pale light emanates from its core. Dragonstones are made using Dragon magic. This one imbues the user's attacks with magical enchantment.

recSjQELG76eeJ2m5.title: Amulet of Concentration
recSjQELG76eeJ2m5.desc: A small orange crystal set in an ornate silver medallion. Created by Kalani Crystalmancers, this small trinket is meant to aid students of crystalmancy in focusing their mental powers.

recUArDcU7lyqTKvh.title: Alchemical Tools
recUArDcU7lyqTKvh.desc: Mortar, pestle, scales, retort, and vials. A skilled alchemist can put these to good use.

recVWmZYIgTcpmRJZ.title: Orowen's Tiara
recVWmZYIgTcpmRJZ.desc: The magnificent moon-silver tiara of the legendary Elven Queen reassembled. When it sat on Orowen's brow it was said to blind those unworthy to look upon her.

recVv95HWuE8tV5A2.title: Crystal Idol
recVv95HWuE8tV5A2.desc: Just what exactly does this pristine crystal carving depict? The energies locked inside the winged relic can be tapped to protect the bearer from fear.

recWdRYxeCa44VhbB.title: Gardener's Idol
recWdRYxeCa44VhbB.desc: A small statuette carved by Thatmas and bathed in growth magic. It depicts a vaguely humanoid plant with living roots and a gentle warmth emanating from it.

recWzbxycuR3ZWGgb.title: Bone Wand
recWzbxycuR3ZWGgb.desc: An arcane wand fashioned from carved bones, covered in dark runes. Necromancers often carry these to aid them in their rituals.

recYT0F6y9HpR05bp.title: Demonbone Vambraces
recYT0F6y9HpR05bp.desc: Carved from the bones and horns of a great demon knight, these grim bracers may burn your arms but will also defend you from magical attacks and effects. An indescribable evil emanates from them.

recc1qgoJgLBRB59C.title: Living Idol
recc1qgoJgLBRB59C.desc: A small statuette carved by Thatmas, bathed in growth magic, and embedded with enchanted crystals. It is a humanoid plant with living roots that is animated by the powerful magic used in its creation.

recc8RzJNLJ0lnMPc.title: Great King's Blessed Ring
recc8RzJNLJ0lnMPc.desc: This unassuming bone ring was granted Ahskul's most powerful blessing so that his agents can hunt down the incorporeal horrors that defy entropy.

reccBW4Ms0eLNuOHA.title: Dragonstone of Protection
reccBW4Ms0eLNuOHA.desc: A palm-sized tourmaline embedded with a protective spell. A pale light emanates from its core. Dragonstones are made using Dragon magic. This one surrounds the user with a protective aura.

recd6li0WbkqpDiDp.title: Jah-Rai-Vek's Pipe
recd6li0WbkqpDiDp.desc: A magical pipe carved from dragonbone. Old Jah-Rai-Vek used it for so long that it became imbued with potent magic that benefits anyone who lights up the pipe.

recdM9R6fUEj9gKTH.title: Murky Eye Broche
recdM9R6fUEj9gKTH.desc: A silver broche with a pearlescent opal carved into an eye in its middle. Those who can sense magic will have their ability enhanced significantly by this arcane treasure.

recdURvunctsLeYtg.title: Dragonstone of Celerity
recdURvunctsLeYtg.desc: A beautiful, palm-sized sapphire embedded with a spell. A pale light emanates from its core. Dragonstones are made using Dragon magic. This one makes the user uncannily swift.

receJUUk31ZOjiInz.title: The Wand of Parhassus
receJUUk31ZOjiInz.desc: The magic wand of High Praeceptor Parhassus was wrought from pure silver and embedded with blue and green gems. Merely touching it charges the person with unfathomable power.

receXLrQztPlcOIgt.title: Varukai Gauntlet
receXLrQztPlcOIgt.desc: The Dark Elven noble family Varuk's warlocks worked for generations on a device that aids in stealing the life essence of victims. They succeeded in the form of these delicate gauntlets.

reciz6xQpVmYdOiN9.title: Skeleton Key
reciz6xQpVmYdOiN9.desc: A serrated key made of tough ivory. Furtive types claim that Nox, Patron of the Night blessed it and thus it can aid in the opening of almost any lock.

recjP8HphDdTC7kvL.title: Large Energy Crystal
recjP8HphDdTC7kvL.desc: One of the items created by Crystalmancy - it is usually owned only by mages. This dagger-sized pale blue crystal contains arcane energies that the user can tap into and use for spells.

reckGKj6jl4zQ1y2g.title: Bloodstone
reckGKj6jl4zQ1y2g.desc: A fist-sized crystal, its red hue so dark that is looks black on a cursory glance. Bright crimson streaks like veins run along it. Warm to the touch, this charm is supposed to enhance the health and stamina of its owner.

reckobC24CCRMz5Zl.title: Gvald Rune
reckobC24CCRMz5Zl.desc: A single rune of power etched onto an iron token. Fuelled by ancient Dwarven magic, the symbol gives the courage of the ancestors to those holding onto it.

recmJChlNgCCHGlzM.title: Medicos Tools
recmJChlNgCCHGlzM.desc: Assorted and well-kept medical tools as well as some rare remedies. These can work wonders in the hands of a trained healer.

recosxaTY3rXBYmLX.title: Icareon's Circlet
recosxaTY3rXBYmLX.desc: An exquisite, slender circlet made of a silverish star-metal and embedded with white, blue, and green precious stones. On the brow of a mage, it becomes a most devastating weapon.

recqIdYrLeE3ITFHd.title: Talisman of Divine Rage
recqIdYrLeE3ITFHd.desc: A small metal talisman that depicts the Raging One, Sergorod. It is warm to the touch and swells up rage in the person holding it.

recsq3xDEL41hzyx0.title: Loaded Dice
recsq3xDEL41hzyx0.desc: Exquisitely carved ivory dice that have a small amount of metal inside them to make them land more often on advantageous sides.

recuheXmHzs5W1yLK.title: Dragonstone of Vitality
recuheXmHzs5W1yLK.desc: An emerald emanating a pale light, cut with great craftsmanship to fit your palm. Dragonstones are made using Dragon magic. This one makes the user more sturdy and energetic.

recumuSwLv4xgfCuj.title: Enchanted Perfume
recumuSwLv4xgfCuj.desc: Some say it is the exquisitely crafted bottle that is magical, and no matter what perfume one applies from it will have an amazing effect on anyone they try to attract.

recvUPeBRXNIOneQl.title: Thatmas' Idol
recvUPeBRXNIOneQl.desc: A small statuette carved from a peculiar wood that looks alive due to the sculptor Thatmas' skills. The idol itself depicts a vaguely humanoid shape, half-formed and twisted with strange roots growing from it.

recwctQBhQmP4hyg8.title: Trap Kit
recwctQBhQmP4hyg8.desc: A large leather belt pouch filled with tools to make work easier for a trapmaker.

recxQn4mHawsQetqY.title: Ring of the Keepers
recxQn4mHawsQetqY.desc: A bronze ring with the words 'Quarer veritis, obscura cognis' written on the inside. A secret treasure of those who call themselves the Keepers.

rec066hh8rjWQIovc.title: Ailing Crew
rec066hh8rjWQIovc.desc: Your crew is weakened and will take several days to fully recover.

rec0WosWqCIkNUimo.title: Endless Resources
rec0WosWqCIkNUimo.desc: The Carpenters' Guild is famous for its ingenious ways to find solutions for all kinds of problems - something you now benefit from, too.

rec0lFWRNjbaqn4LD.title: Corpse Collector
rec0lFWRNjbaqn4LD.desc: The 'good' people of Velarias trusted you with gathering corpses for them to eat. Fighting enemies with your comitatus might yield you piles of bodies.

rec0tvUeRAJ2qjfar.title: Hangover
rec0tvUeRAJ2qjfar.desc: Your crew feels like shit. Hopefully, they at least had a blast last night.

rec11rpTEZuYXEhEL.title: Total Workforce
rec11rpTEZuYXEhEL.desc:
Workforce represents the capacity of your crew's work output to cover the needs of the /comitatus/.

/You need %totalworkforceneed% workforce from your Workers, Slaves, and Passengers combined for the efficient operation of the comitatus. You have %workforce%./

rec1x59gBVX9RXpAz.title: Precision
rec1x59gBVX9RXpAz.desc: The Tribune Vigilax has pointed out flaws in the Dragon warriors' armor that your companion can abuse.

rec1z62Mdax7OWgCd.title: Invigorated
rec1z62Mdax7OWgCd.desc: Your crew is more energetic and vigilant than usual.

rec2wmoQvZT3At2fn.title: Punitive Methods
rec2wmoQvZT3At2fn.desc: House Darius slave overseers are reputed for their inhuman disciplinary methods.

rec3JKAW4Evj3YqAL.title: Stash
rec3JKAW4Evj3YqAL.desc: Goods hidden in the Stash part of your Cargo hold are hidden from inspections and are more protected from looters in crew combat.

rec3dWfIMkUEpwIBI.title: Movement
rec3dWfIMkUEpwIBI.desc: Movement Points (MP) represents how far the /comitatus/ can travel each day. Each step on the campaign map costs MP.

rec3oWeGrMkltXOCe.title: Understaffed
rec3oWeGrMkltXOCe.desc: You do not have a sufficient working crew to cover all the tasks around your venture. Things take longer, and so the /comitatus/ slows down.

rec3ukRqOlxUoyL3K.title: Max Prowess
rec3ukRqOlxUoyL3K.desc: Prowess indicates how powerful and experienced the Companion is. Each time their Prowess is raised, they gain Proficiency points you can spend on improving them.  /In the current Alpha build, Prowess is capped at 2./

rec4S5LRoMLYoEHwe.title: Defense
rec4S5LRoMLYoEHwe.desc: The measure of defensive power in Crew Combat. It is contested against the opponent's Combat Strength to define the chances of a success attack each round.

rec5Z4lulXoYxJVoP.title: Acid Lungs
rec5Z4lulXoYxJVoP.desc: A strange affliction is upon your companion. It comes with headaches, weakness, nausea, and causes excessive vomiting. Occasionally, strange burns appear on the skin.

rec5cYRbOxpWs3vWx.title: Fiery Spirits
rec5cYRbOxpWs3vWx.desc: The chilly secretion from the insect eggs raises the spirit for days on end.

rec5e3zZtewNgKnr5.title: Zealous Anger
rec5e3zZtewNgKnr5.desc: The Raging One grants his true believers the righteous might to overcome their enemies.

rec5wEkPf5MuHxksM.title: Soldiers of the Cause
rec5wEkPf5MuHxksM.desc: True followers of the Abolitionists tend to fight with a righteous zeal and unmatched tenacity.

rec6ioReUsCrq0zAG.title: Eradicate the Undead
rec6ioReUsCrq0zAG.desc: Blessed are those who aid the followers of Ahskul in their endless battle against rogue Undead.

rec6oXcxZq4Mc5NYf.title: Morale
rec6oXcxZq4Mc5NYf.desc:
The general mental well-being and confidence of the /comitatus/.
/Low Morale penalizes, while high Morale boosts Worker Workforce./

rec6y7S2hViPynJxh.title: Enchanted
rec6y7S2hViPynJxh.desc: The /comitatus/ can vanquish foes impervious to mundane weapons.

rec7GS3ruYZOxoLG9.title: Sadirar Spirit Ward
rec7GS3ruYZOxoLG9.desc: The Great Spirits shall ward you against malevolent spectral entities, even aiding in their destruction.

rec7R2dq2n0jKRzvf.title: Handjari Tactics
rec7R2dq2n0jKRzvf.desc: Handjari soldiers are renowned for their versatility, easily switching between ranged and melee combat as necessary, as well as using hit-and-run tactics very effectively.

rec7uEuWiYp5GJzZZ.title: Corpse Pile
rec7uEuWiYp5GJzZZ.desc: A pile of rotting corpses, collected for the 'good' people of Velarias.

rec8acnpWqmyh5Axx.title: Salt Miner: Kawdan
rec8acnpWqmyh5Axx.desc: You are accompanied by Kawdan, a Tainted salt prospector with four arms and numerous years of experience when it comes to Brine Mere's harvesting.

rec8gt4h1zJ8wB7pW.title: Lifedrained Companion
rec8gt4h1zJ8wB7pW.desc: A crippling debilitation holds you in its clutches as if your very life forces had been sapped, making every little movement a veritable struggle in the face of overwhelming odds for you and your /comes/.

rec99Ic1bdborgBMC.title: Physical Damage Immunity
rec99Ic1bdborgBMC.desc: Mundane weapons can not harm your companion.

rec99PZ3I2XGvCHmb.title: Honor to Work For
rec99PZ3I2XGvCHmb.desc: Hirelings flock to House Venari's reputation as a respectable and stable employer.

rec9Ux1sDqtrQseoy.title: The Reavers' Rally
rec9Ux1sDqtrQseoy.desc: Is it tenacity, fate, or luck? Whatever the case, the Dread Reavers always survive even in the face of toughest challenge and fiercest battle. This time, Wyrm hunters rally to their cause and follow them into the fray.

rec9p7m983i1oy04R.title: Shaken
rec9p7m983i1oy04R.desc: You are a bit shook up by recent events.

recAAlf4rjuFaxcOH.title: Salt Cache Size at the Outpost
recAAlf4rjuFaxcOH.altitle: Salt Cache Size at the Outpost
recAAlf4rjuFaxcOH.desc: The quantity of Salt units in your outpost's stockpile. You can leave instructions to your overseer on whether they should sell some in your absence or not.

recAKuCvx63nBCBT3.title: Discipline
recAKuCvx63nBCBT3.desc: Discipline shows how effectively you can apply violence to make your slaves more obedient.

recAlyKvRgqbxRLDl.title: Abjuring Glyphs
recAlyKvRgqbxRLDl.desc: The small charms and fetishes handed to the trusted friends of the Covenant provide magical protection to your /comitatus/.

recAsQcdVlyHkFC68.title: Worker
recAsQcdVlyHkFC68.desc:
Workers take care of everyday chores and haul cargo. They can fight but not too well.

/You need %workforceneed% workforce from your Workers, Slaves, and Passengers combined for the efficient operation of the comitatus. You currently produce %tworkforce%. 
Each Worker carries %cargo% cargo./
recAsQcdVlyHkFC68.altdesc: Workers take care of everyday chores and haul cargo. They can fight but not too well.

recAzSfGmcYbx5BwQ.title: Undefended
recAzSfGmcYbx5BwQ.desc: You do not have enough guards for even the most rudimentary defenses.

recBfmXbhu1FuYEoy.title: Disdain of Ahskul
recBfmXbhu1FuYEoy.desc: You have invoked the God of Death's ire. Woe betides you and those that accompany you.

recBuUJXLIVL4pgCe.title: Greater Blessing of Sergorod
recBuUJXLIVL4pgCe.desc: The Raging One's divine power was granted to your /comitatus/, giving your companions stamina, vigor, and vengeful wrath in combat.

recCCK6AYj0o3bjyM.title: Defense
recCCK6AYj0o3bjyM.desc: The measure of defensive power in Crew Combat. It is contested against the opponent's Combat Strength to define the chances of a success attack each round.

recClbvDsdxFBpx5D.title: Chase
recClbvDsdxFBpx5D.desc: Chase is the measure of your crew's skill at hunting down retreating or fleeing enemies in crew combat.

recDGP4OZb1THPkmD.title: Flee
recDGP4OZb1THPkmD.desc: Flee is the measure of how quickly and effectively your /comitatus/ can run away from crew combat encounters.

recDgf2MPmYc7jw0G.title: Privilege to Work For
recDgf2MPmYc7jw0G.desc: Hirelings flock to House Venari's reputation as a respectable and stable employer.

recE6ZLMZ3wmtzpIk.title: Lure Away
recE6ZLMZ3wmtzpIk.desc: Lure Away represents how well you can misdirect savage or bestial crew combat enemy types so that they let you leave without a fight in exchange for a lure.

recEC41RcOkCiS5AH.title: Shalimi Blessing
recEC41RcOkCiS5AH.desc: The pure, wholesome essence of the universe guides you.

recEUAduqtrbLu7cx.title: Enfeebled
recEUAduqtrbLu7cx.desc: Your bodies and spirits are significantly weakened, almost broken, as an oppressive sensation of pain constantly pulses in the veins of your crew.

recEXUEsdF3pDOdmp.title: Salt Miner: Titus Prosco
recEXUEsdF3pDOdmp.desc: You have hired Titus Prosco, an Imperial expatriate, former military engineer, and veteran salt miner around Salum. He is regarded highly by his fellow prospectors and is considered a professional with great integrity.

recEZVoBoQWScNxDY.title: Inspiration
recEZVoBoQWScNxDY.desc: One of the keys to success.

recEj6DhUirq13IdO.title: Sleepless
recEj6DhUirq13IdO.desc: Was it really the vile Beshbaur who summoned the nightmares? Does it matter now that you and your crew are unable to sleep and function properly?

recEsnwlf86bWsQLi.title: Severely Understaffed
recEsnwlf86bWsQLi.desc: You do not have a sufficient working crew to cover most tasks around your venture. Things take longer, and so the /comitatus/ slows down considerably.

recEvQRaZKxhxaRR8.title: Moreldin Martial Prowess
recEvQRaZKxhxaRR8.desc: Disciplined, precise, and cruel, the Dark Elven soldiers of Prince Laekor are fearsome warriors in the battle against the Sand Wyrms.

recExSihD7XMcj9Kd.title: Favored
recExSihD7XMcj9Kd.desc:
Whether the Gods or fate favors you is unclear. It makes a huge difference nonetheless.
/This is a constant boon due to Dissonance Mode./

recFFKvqCGgUciTey.title: Total Workforce Needed at the Outpost

recFaeBpWuILAO95U.title: Assail the Competition
recFaeBpWuILAO95U.desc: The Ratharnak are famous for their aggressive expansion and with them supporting you, your reach has become greater.

recGIt1cL74WJHMX2.title: Green Pox
recGIt1cL74WJHMX2.desc: A horrid affliction grips your companion. Weakness, nausea, oozing sores, and coughing accompanies this ailment.

recGNn7HfckduZz4T.title: Edvoril's Blessing
recGNn7HfckduZz4T.desc: Edvoril's blessing makes your mind race with ideas and plans.

recHUS512jIsyhLSy.title: Aristocrats' Dominion
recHUS512jIsyhLSy.desc: House Venari's authority and decisiveness has found its way to rub off on you.

recHexSIGcTZs7CIh.title: Prospector: Rendo the Vast
recHexSIGcTZs7CIh.desc: You are accompanied by Rendo the Vast, a surprisingly fat Dwarf who is able to tell ore quality by taste and touch. By the opinion of at least half of the Mines of Plenty, he is the best person to hire as a prospecting adviser.

recHuLvU37klkq8az.title: Kandake's Cargo
recHuLvU37klkq8az.desc: The eccentric researcher has filled your cargo holds to the brim with her tools and paraphernalia.

recIDuFsut0eZC9nf.title: Kalarruk's Favor
recIDuFsut0eZC9nf.desc: Fickle he might be, Kalarruk still does bestow blessings on those that hunt and wander.

recILJ67UdvjynClW.title: Slave
recILJ67UdvjynClW.desc:
Slaves function the same as workers but they have no Upkeep and less Consumption.

/You need %workforceneed% workforce from your Workers, Slaves, and Passengers combined for the efficient operation of the comitatus. You currently produce %tworkforce%. 
Each Slaves carries %cargo% cargo./
recILJ67UdvjynClW.altdesc: Slaves function the same as workers but they have no Upkeep and less Consumption.

recIgh8KCYr8cZY8Y.title: Difference from the Optimal Number of Working Crew at your Outpost

recIhFzuOjcNXhoXa.title: Authority
recIhFzuOjcNXhoXa.desc: Authority dictates how many assigned Deputies you can have at any given time (absolute maximum of 6, regardless of bonuses). Authority also makes your Companions more tolerant with the decisions you make, with higher Authority lessening the Loyalty losses for companions. Bonuses that raise Maximum Authority beyond 6 have no effect.

recIrreFyY5JhYwb4.title: Ambush
recIrreFyY5JhYwb4.desc: The chance of ambushing unsuspecting traveling groups you come across.

recIwFqNqlqVNyG7e.title: Arkon's Light
recIwFqNqlqVNyG7e.desc: Not only are Agoram and the Oghres veritable giants who can crush foes with ease, but they also wield their strange God's divine light, which grants courage and heals wounds.

recJ90eM2hVY2mvJD.title: Critically Understaffed
recJ90eM2hVY2mvJD.desc: You do not have a sufficient working crew to cover most tasks around your venture. Things take longer, and so the /comitatus/ slows down considerably.

recJFXOECb5BwelRx.title: Salt Miner: Bergavuor
recJFXOECb5BwelRx.desc: You are accompanied by Bergavuor, a Dragonkin salt miner of Salum in the employ of the Ratharnak Alliance. She is known for having worked on the old quarries and pits where her engineering skills were instrumental in setting up operations.

recJkvsSBmlnRWzM1.title: Avernus Shield Wall
recJkvsSBmlnRWzM1.desc: The /testudo/ formation and other advanced shield tactics of the Imperial armies were retained by the Avernus Legion, making them a formidable wall of iron on the battlefield.

recJukILudd0pSrJU.title: Sadirar Magic
recJukILudd0pSrJU.desc: Although the Sadirar tribesmen are outstanding desert warriors, their true strength comes from their shamans' magic commanding Earth, Wind, Fire, and Water.

recJxuHDo1LZ3Ox7r.title: Ahskulite Spirit Charm
recJxuHDo1LZ3Ox7r.desc: The divine energies of Ahskul were used to temporarily enchant your weapons against specters.

recK1tMmTyhxPys4e.title: Blessing of Unbinding
recK1tMmTyhxPys4e.desc: Some deities' ire is endless toward those that recklessly pervert death. Unbinding the shackles of the Returned is one of their great powers.

recK4JA3990pL3Z6e.title: Collegium Brigades
recK4JA3990pL3Z6e.desc: Unionized workers may know too much about their rights but they sure know a lot more about their responsibilities as well.

recK6AZ5ZsTO7hgbr.title: Mushroom Rot
recK6AZ5ZsTO7hgbr.desc: You and your crew contracted a strange infection from mushrooms. People are likely to die in choking fits on a daily basis.

recK7uGcx7t6iwzrp.title: Shield of Searing Light
recK7uGcx7t6iwzrp.desc: White light protects you from shadows but also empowers your attacks.

recKGfwnv4W4SKQSB.title: Ever Vigilant
recKGfwnv4W4SKQSB.desc: Sergorod's vigilance is said never to fail and never to cease. Some of that keenness is granted to his followers.

recKKOSWstqZGpJmO.title: Kelp Soup
recKKOSWstqZGpJmO.desc: Although the strange soup brewed from brightkelp is sour, its effects last for quite a while, sharpening senses and immunizing the body.

recKhWnWtVJvGEbMr.title: Lavendius' Blessing
recKhWnWtVJvGEbMr.desc: The fact that Lavendius' blessings work gives credit to the claims that he has become a deity, albeit a minor one.

recKqat6PZh2m2vih.title: Push Them
recKqat6PZh2m2vih.desc: The cruel methods used by House Darius to enhance the effectiveness of their slaves are widely known and feared.

recL7FOGTRDUSfbds.title: Thessara's Flame
recL7FOGTRDUSfbds.desc: Magical flames summoned by Thessara engulf your weapons.

recLgqhQLEHHtGQ2g.title: Blessing of the Winds
recLgqhQLEHHtGQ2g.desc: Those blessed by the Great Wind Spirit reach their destination with ease and have an uncanny way of avoiding bad weather.

recLqqsaYElkbOzad.title: Difference from the Optimal Number of Scouts at your Outpost

recM9jq6PpGnPov2I.title: Black Rot
recM9jq6PpGnPov2I.desc: A terrible, lethal disease that causes a dark rot to set into the victim's gums, then skin and muscles. Those who contract it tend to die in agony within a few days.

recMafKNcqSE5eAuK.title: Blessing of Ahskul
recMafKNcqSE5eAuK.desc: The Great King's divine power was granted to your /comitatus/, holding your companions at death's door when they are wounded.

recMrKzz2qfd1L59f.title: Difference from the Optimal Number of your Total Outpost Crew

recMzvyRKirqBmiDV.title: Precision
recMzvyRKirqBmiDV.desc: The Tribune Vigilax has pointed out flaws in the Dragon warriors' armor that your companions can abuse.

recNVZowwrTOs6Ow2.title: Greater Blessing of Ahskul
recNVZowwrTOs6Ow2.desc: The Great King's divine power was granted to your /comitatus/, protecting your crew from wandering Undead.

recO6HcxFieuU3C8V.title: Cargo
recO6HcxFieuU3C8V.desc: Shows the maximum and available cargo space in your hold.

recOQWvVvVc6f1OGe.title: Money
recOQWvVvVc6f1OGe.desc:
%bross% Bross  %lyrg% Lyrg %changer% Changers
/1 Bross = 10 Lyrg/
/1 Lyrg = 10 Changers/

recP4EdLLmpfuaXgG.title: Enchanted
recP4EdLLmpfuaXgG.desc: Your companion can vanquish foes impervious to mundane weapons.

recP6yqgDt0umxGcX.title: Varotian Enchantment
recP6yqgDt0umxGcX.desc: The old Varotian Death God reclaims the spirits that belong to him through your companion.

recPUM2v0bn7k21Gk.title: Outpost Productivity
recPUM2v0bn7k21Gk.desc: This is the measure of your outpost staff's effectiveness of mining salt.

recPz7824zWs9OSlO.title: Disdain of Ahskul
recPz7824zWs9OSlO.desc: You have invoked the God of Death's ire. Woe betides you and those that accompany you.

recQ74OS4gQegtIL9.title: Renown
recQ74OS4gQegtIL9.desc: Renown is gained by performing acts of great importance or publicity and by working for Factions. It represents how well you are known on the continent.

recQKydaHKWM4FjeV.title: Industrious Endeavors
recQKydaHKWM4FjeV.desc: Your contacts at the Ratharnak Alliance provide you with valuable advice when it comes to activities related to industry and harvesting.

recQtMahm601byjJs.title: Non-combat Hireling
recQtMahm601byjJs.desc: This character never fights in combat.

recRchleHioeBH7dX.title: Beukkha's Blessing
recRchleHioeBH7dX.desc: Beukkha is a strange hag indeed. Her blessing invigorates and calms your mind.

recRu5S9M1yfhBWP4.title: Vigilance
recRu5S9M1yfhBWP4.desc: Vigilance is your crew's likeliness of discovering ambushes, be it during camping or the day.

recS5LrM2VfzOYzIr.title: Difference from the Optimal Number of your Total Outpost Crew

recSHaTqeobPXc4jt.title: Blessing of Spirits
recSHaTqeobPXc4jt.desc: Benevolent spirits accompany your journey, guarding your sleep, keeping away evil specters.

recSiZpFLhMBywX90.title: Black Rot
recSiZpFLhMBywX90.desc: A terrible, lethal disease that causes a dark rot to set into the victim's gums, then skin and muscles. Those who contract it tend to die in agony within a few days.

recTA4JOxrmjw0r95.title: Blessing of Sergorod
recTA4JOxrmjw0r95.desc: The Raging One's divine power was granted to your /comitatus/, giving your crew stamina, vigor, and vengeful wrath in combat.

recTDSctVXRGFrBqm.title: Access to Arcane Knowledge
recTDSctVXRGFrBqm.desc: Though secretive, the Scythichnis Covenant is known to share their knowledge of magic with those worthy of their trust.

recTiM8eyN5CWcfRU.title: Sadirar War Blessing
recTiM8eyN5CWcfRU.desc: Although peaceful, the Sadirar can summon the rage of the spirit world when angered.

recU91U3jYq7yie5Y.title: Damaged Carts
recU91U3jYq7yie5Y.desc: The carts of the /comitatus/ have sustained damage, slowing you down until repairs can be made.

recUYknbXv6Bony2A.title: Ahskulite Spirit Charm
recUYknbXv6Bony2A.desc: The divine energies of Ahskul were used to temporarily enchant your weapons against specters.

recUZ29tr8Q37Ktfq.title: Always Alert
recUZ29tr8Q37Ktfq.desc: Sergorod's vigilance is said never to fail and never to cease. Some of that keenness is granted to his followers.

recUmVXB7XTTJAS81.title: Edvoril's Blessing
recUmVXB7XTTJAS81.desc: What weird magic is this, regenerating and energizing your /comes/ while taking nothing?

recUofZqrAb0LprN8.title: Social Disease
recUofZqrAb0LprN8.desc: Your crew should be more careful about where they stick what.

recV6I1gLmq2HpVwE.title: Abjuring Baubles
recV6I1gLmq2HpVwE.desc: The small charms and fetishes handed to the trusted friends of the Covenant provide magical protection to your /comitatus/.

recVCwyFy2Tp6NTLK.title: Loaders' Contacts
recVCwyFy2Tp6NTLK.desc: Knowing the right people in cities can get you better work opportunities even if these jobs are on the less dignified side.

recVa4MG7fWdBfiXG.title: Partially Defended
recVa4MG7fWdBfiXG.desc: Guarding your camp effectively puts a strain on your guards.

recW9JX0X0HJdJJeC.title: Movement
recW9JX0X0HJdJJeC.desc: Movement Points (MP) represents how far the /comitatus/ can travel each day. Each step on the campaign map costs MP.

recWFnOjFehBuQ8ES.title: Tired
recWFnOjFehBuQ8ES.desc: Your companion is exhausted and is bound to make mistakes.

recWX35OCpCclIP3m.title: Eliminate the Competition
recWX35OCpCclIP3m.desc: The Ratharnak are famous for their aggressive expansion and with them supporting you, your reach has become greater.

recX4T1NW3CD9LM5G.title: Favored
recX4T1NW3CD9LM5G.desc:
Whether the Gods or fate favors your companion is unclear. It makes a huge difference nonetheless.
/This is a constant boon due to Dissonance Mode./

recZvjMSDeD3V8dPy.title: Riders of Vako
recZvjMSDeD3V8dPy.desc: Your forces are bolstered by the vicious Riders of Vako.

recaG2aW9MG7KX9iQ.title: Combat Strength
recaG2aW9MG7KX9iQ.desc: The measure of offensive power in Crew Combat. It is contested against the opponent's Defense to define the chances of a success attack each round.

recbIJD7dNDjd7uZ8.title: Lifedrained
recbIJD7dNDjd7uZ8.desc: A crippling debilitation holds you in its clutches as if your very life forces had been sapped, making every little movement a veritable struggle in the face of overwhelming odds for you and your /comes/.

reccGdlfTczZ5sxJE.title: Kalarruk's Favor
reccGdlfTczZ5sxJE.desc: Fickle he might be, Kalarruk still does bestow blessings on those that hunt and wander.

recccaeixbyp0J1tf.title: Thessara's Flame
recccaeixbyp0J1tf.desc: Magical flames summoned by Thessara engulf your weapons.

recczIdTe0ALIzWMf.title: Terrified
recczIdTe0ALIzWMf.desc: Utter terror grips the heart of your comrade.

recdCKTzzL7lVfvDz.title: Hireling
recdCKTzzL7lVfvDz.desc: This character is a mercenary bound by contract to serve you for a limited time.

recdCVi2FFicPldoj.title: Enchanted
recdCVi2FFicPldoj.desc: The /comitatus/ can vanquish foes impervious to mundane weapons.

recdM8BjdSEGbpcTk.title: Blessing of Unbinding
recdM8BjdSEGbpcTk.desc: Some deities' ire is endless toward those that recklessly pervert death. Unbinding the shackles of the Returned is one of their great powers.

recebtJCYXvcd4KEs.title: The Great Skull
recebtJCYXvcd4KEs.desc: A gigantic skull that once belonged to the Leviathan, drawn ponderously by your /comitatus/. Does it whisper or is that only the wind?

recenbTPIS3xELJOj.title: Mercenary Contract
recenbTPIS3xELJOj.desc: This mercenary's contract is still binding. Once the time runs out, they will leave the /comitatus/.

recf0cgpd3tPLMLwN.title: Negotiate
recf0cgpd3tPLMLwN.desc: Negotiate represents how well you can bargain with intelligent crew combat enemy types so that they let you leave without a fight in exchange for a tribute.

recf4lVZ0jT5HDg0H.title: Mount
recf4lVZ0jT5HDg0H.desc:
Mounts haul cargo and can be used to create Outriders (by mounting a Fighter).
Type: %type%

/Each riderless Mount carries %cargo% cargo./
recf4lVZ0jT5HDg0H.altdesc: Mounts haul cargo and can be used to create Outriders (by mounting a Fighter).

recf6a0FB240r1PHn.title: Mortally Wounded
recf6a0FB240r1PHn.desc: Your hireling is at the door of death and may die at any moment unless healed.

recg30BXfaFY7f8WE.title: All Mounted
recg30BXfaFY7f8WE.desc:
All your crew is mounted, allowing you to traverse faster. Mounts used by your crew carry less cargo.
/Your comitatus automatically loses this status if the size of your crew exceeds the number of your mounts./

recg6XH5lUrrgnCZh.title: Fiery Spirits
recg6XH5lUrrgnCZh.desc: The chilly secretion from the insect eggs raises the spirit for days on end.

rechAZ5LWk2xFXCxx.title: Disciplinary Methods
rechAZ5LWk2xFXCxx.desc: House Darius slave overseers are reputed for their inhuman disciplinary methods.

rechQ0IddKvVrKJh3.title: Poorly Defended
rechQ0IddKvVrKJh3.desc: Guarding your camp even in the most rudimentary way puts a strain on your guards.

rechhVudoY4TMabSR.title: Loaders' Associates
rechhVudoY4TMabSR.desc: Knowing the right people in cities can get you better work opportunities even if these jobs are on the less dignified side.

rechrgSsPiN41a4nF.title: Resist Entropy
rechrgSsPiN41a4nF.desc: Death may be inevitable but the Great King is displeased when souls enter his realm before their time.

rechuYZG3zozDBUuq.title: Collegium Bands
rechuYZG3zozDBUuq.desc: Unionized workers may know too much about their rights but they sure know a lot more about their responsibilities as well.

reci22hfA24ymDa0r.title: Poisoned
reci22hfA24ymDa0r.desc: Your companion is under the effects of a toxin.

reciX5otHyIlcDOmQ.title: Go Soft on Them
reciX5otHyIlcDOmQ.desc: The lenient methods of House Oquo are sometimes known to produce beneficial effects on slave labor.

reciYlYGxA2OMEkUG.title: Wrath of Sergorod
reciYlYGxA2OMEkUG.desc: You have made the God of Rage angry at you. Woe betides you and those that accompany you.

recirLoRbvonhzhVx.title: Major Advantage
recirLoRbvonhzhVx.desc: Prince Laekor taught you Dark Elven silent signs to catch the Dragon warriors off their guard.

reciuvo3NORdCoGUy.title: Momentum
reciuvo3NORdCoGUy.desc: Lucius Fravo's instructions aid your companion in breaking up the Dragon warriors' formation in the arena battle.

recj7LskHKJV1De08.title: Abjuring Baubles
recj7LskHKJV1De08.desc: The small charms and fetishes of the Covenant provide magical protection.

recj9ZCurYwR4G5XZ.title: Plenty of Resources
recj9ZCurYwR4G5XZ.desc: The Carpenters' Guild is famous for its ingenious ways to find solutions for all kinds of problems - something you now benefit from, too.

recjEszDxrUUurE5I.title: Enfeeblement
recjEszDxrUUurE5I.desc: Your companion is under the effect of a charm or curse that weakens the will and body alike.

recjrIV1VrR35uNS8.title: Blessing of Flame
recjrIV1VrR35uNS8.desc: The Great Fire Spirit granted your crew scorching courage and vigilance that does not dwindle.

recjv9S7WBEMd9SeJ.title: Conspiring Slaves
recjv9S7WBEMd9SeJ.desc: With so many slaves in your crew, they have more opportunities to plot and rebel.

reckI9d735uTL7beH.title: Curse of Spirits
reckI9d735uTL7beH.desc: Angry spirits are chasing you, keeping you awake at night, awaiting the opportunities to strike.

reckS3V60qo3X2n7v.title: Carpenters' Associates
reckS3V60qo3X2n7v.desc: Knowing the right people in cities can get you better work opportunities even if these jobs are on the less dignified side.

reckljpdeUTaJTDLx.title: Abjuring Glyphs
reckljpdeUTaJTDLx.desc: The small charms and fetishes of the Covenant provide magical protection.

recktT3hc9dcI3QWD.title: Acid Lungs
recktT3hc9dcI3QWD.desc: A strange affliction is upon your crew. People experience headaches, weakness, nausea, and often vomit excessively. Occasionally, strange burns appear on their skin.

recl8FnnqzKXJnwfH.title: Prospector: Amangi
recl8FnnqzKXJnwfH.desc: You are accompanied by Amangi, a seasoned expert who has labored in mines for years, became a supervisor, then started his own enterprise. After a smelting accident where he lost his left hand, he retired but is still a great source of advice and expertise.

reclFgSSphqutC1Yq.title: Squeeze Them
reclFgSSphqutC1Yq.desc: The cruel methods used by House Darius to enhance the effectiveness of their slaves are widely known and feared.

reclJZQI5tGfQnBlH.title: Impervious Defense
reclJZQI5tGfQnBlH.desc: This type of defensive power can only be overcome by Enchanted Combat Strength.

reclLgKx2q05bNDDg.title: Vigor
reclLgKx2q05bNDDg.desc: The measure of the physical state of the /comitatus/.

recmEZ48KU88DICTi.title: Zealots of the Cause
recmEZ48KU88DICTi.desc: True followers of the Abolitionists tend to fight with a righteous zeal and unmatched tenacity.

recmL0krlnYAJ2XFQ.title: Enchanted Strength
recmL0krlnYAJ2XFQ.desc: The measure of magically imbued offensive power. It is the only part of Combat Strength that is used against Impervious opponents.

recmZftreh8QWAzyn.title: Combat Strength
recmZftreh8QWAzyn.desc: The measure of offensive power in Crew Combat. It is contested against the opponent's Defense to define the chances of a success attack each round.

recmvBEw0EQA4014P.title: Beukkha's Blessing
recmvBEw0EQA4014P.desc: Beukkha is a strange hag indeed. Her blessing invigorates and calms the crew.

recnLoYH6USgk8xuz.title: Zealous Rage
recnLoYH6USgk8xuz.desc: The Raging One grants his true believers the righteous might to overcome their enemies.

recnNlGfUBMYeL7qx.title: Haunted by Shadows
recnNlGfUBMYeL7qx.desc: Shadows are on the hunt. You are their prey.

recniKlnZIj3aOLaN.title: Occasional Breaks
recniKlnZIj3aOLaN.desc: Well-rested slaves and workers are the key to success according to the Oquo, and their work brigades take breaks in turns.

recnoFBJiqmk8XIE1.title: Abolitionist Cyphers
recnoFBJiqmk8XIE1.desc:
Received from a cell of the Abolitionist movement, these codes and
secret signs will lead you to another cell in a locationwhere they have
a presence that you have not contacted yet. The cyphers deteriorate
with time, so you should use them quickly.

reco8TnlNbd11tzZA.title: Nutrition
reco8TnlNbd11tzZA.desc:
Represents how well-fed the /comitatus/ is. Affected by the amount of food given to the crew in the long run.
/Low Nutrition penalizes, while high Nutrition boosts Vigor. Low Nutrition also lowers maximum Vigor./

recoIqgvGAzAx93dx.title: Battle Entropy
recoIqgvGAzAx93dx.desc: Death may be inevitable but the Great King is displeased when souls enter his realm before their time.

recoJNpJDzfsxLxpy.title: Treachery of Bal Ur Kaal
recoJNpJDzfsxLxpy.desc: You have provoked the God of Deception. Woe betides you and those that accompany you.

recoK7cKZ6snz8bPM.title: Weakened
recoK7cKZ6snz8bPM.desc: You can not seem to summon the strength to deal with anything efficiently.

recoTV64QUeOCKABX.title: Combat Strength
recoTV64QUeOCKABX.desc: The measure of offensive power in Crew Combat. It is contested against the opponent's Defense to define the chances of a success attack each round.

recolkt5ZeEHTwlim.title: Wrath of Sergorod
recolkt5ZeEHTwlim.desc: You have made the God of Rage angry at you. Woe betides you and those that accompany you.

recooQRHCPrWHQDbD.title: Scout
recooQRHCPrWHQDbD.desc: Scouts can retrieve information about adjacent nodes. They are decent in a fight.
recooQRHCPrWHQDbD.altdesc: Scouts can retrieve information about adjacent nodes. They are decent in a fight.

recoz0MeTPg2ocDEl.title: Passenger
recoz0MeTPg2ocDEl.desc: People you agreed to take to their travel destinations.

recp6JMO9fQIA9sfH.title: Reconnaisance
recp6JMO9fQIA9sfH.desc: Eylani's eagle Striker scouted the movements of Sand Wyrms, giving you an edge.

recpAfnoZ0iNpMQkT.title: Momentum
recpAfnoZ0iNpMQkT.desc: Lucius Fravo has instructed you how to break up the Dragon warriors' formation in the arena battle.

recpNy3SMAdcFrIjA.title: Water Poisoning
recpNy3SMAdcFrIjA.desc: Whatever was in that water makes those who drank from it shiver and vomit for days on end.

recpcHqlyEqYXtCAx.title: UnpaidDays
recpcHqlyEqYXtCAx.desc: The number of days your crew has gone without pay.

recpjSvqRmhUOYv6c.title: Total Consumption
recpjSvqRmhUOYv6c.desc: The current total your /comitatus/ consumes per day given in Consumption points (1 /Supplies/ equals 1 Consumption points).

recplO8wGZJBrPKGb.title: Difference from the Optimal Number of Fighters at your Outpost

recplnJS4YMSl61uU.title: Go Easy on Them
recplnJS4YMSl61uU.desc: The lenient methods of House Oquo are sometimes known to produce beneficial effects on slave labor.

recpomcz2Qh2ARsoj.title: Blessing of the Waters
recpomcz2Qh2ARsoj.desc: Those blessed by the Great Water Spirit find food and water more frequently in the wasteland and heal at an enhanced rate.

recq4hY6CpF4xxayL.title: Treachery of Bal Ur Kaal
recq4hY6CpF4xxayL.desc: You have provoked the God of Deception. Woe betides you and those that accompany you.

recqRBMeaEKngnq7f.title: Difference from the Optimal Number of Mounts at your Outpost

recqfepONyLyVROvL.title: Aristocrats' Authority
recqfepONyLyVROvL.desc: House Venari's authority and decisiveness has found its way to rub off on you.

recqxwY05LBKxaSD4.title: Defense
recqxwY05LBKxaSD4.desc: The measure of defensive power in Crew Combat. It is contested against the opponent's Combat Strength to define the chances of a success attack each round.

recr2QFEc6Zuxui7y.title: Greater Blessing of Ahskul
recr2QFEc6Zuxui7y.desc: The Great King's divine power was granted to your /comitatus/, holding your companions at death's door when they are wounded.

recrBwSOE73bqJ5tY.title: Hale and Hearty
recrBwSOE73bqJ5tY.desc: Your companion has more energy and stamina than the usual.

recrIbThxpIycDFxy.title: Total Upkeep
recrIbThxpIycDFxy.desc: The current total you have to pay to your crew per day.

recrKnGJOPp86KC8o.title: Access to Arcane Secrets
recrKnGJOPp86KC8o.desc: Though secretive, the Scythichnis Covenant is known to share their knowledge of magic with those worthy of their trust.

recrVVGb94KJDh8Tr.title: CompPerkTestStatus
recrVVGb94KJDh8Tr.desc: Test status - automatically Crit Fail heal test

recrn7nPZS4pWY7L2.title: Enchanted Strength
recrn7nPZS4pWY7L2.desc: The measure of magically imbued offensive power. It is the only part of Combat Strength that is used against Impervious opponents.

recsDmmOlLagIN4xK.title: Outrider
recsDmmOlLagIN4xK.desc:
Outriders are mounted fighters. Exceptionally good when attacking. Created by mounting a Fighter on a Mount.

/Each Outrider carries %cargo% cargo./
recsDmmOlLagIN4xK.altdesc: Outriders are mounted fighters. Exceptionally good when attacking. Created by mounting a Fighter on a Mount.

recsQQ3U09v5dwnlW.title: Haunted by Nightmares
recsQQ3U09v5dwnlW.desc: Night terrors plague your sleep, making you exhausted and morose by day.

rectRBIzRHwDJOWfy.title: Prowess
rectRBIzRHwDJOWfy.desc: Prowess indicates how powerful and experienced the Companion is. Each time their Prowess is raised, they gain Proficiency points you can spend on improving them.  /In the current Alpha build, Prowess is capped at 2./

rectmDTZG8EPDDbHP.title: Resourcefulness
rectmDTZG8EPDDbHP.desc: Resourcefulness can be used to aid in various tasks, such as Tests, additional Movement Points, or combat. Check the Perks under Leadership to see the specific uses of Resourcefulness. Bonuses that raise Maximum Resourcefulness beyond 12 have no effect.

rectzm6p6CpZnIokp.title: Severely Wounded
rectzm6p6CpZnIokp.desc: Your companion is seriously wounded and will not be able to take part in combat or other actions.

recu6Tz8vqMD641mH.title: Blessing of Sergorod
recu6Tz8vqMD641mH.desc: The Raging One's divine power was granted to your /comitatus/, giving your companions stamina, vigor, and vengeful wrath in combat.

recuINUHWS4fxxZ1w.title: The Running Bowels
recuINUHWS4fxxZ1w.desc: Your crew ate something that makes them soil themselves again and again. This is no joke - people can die due to this under certain circumstances.

recuNLergcz1MKiEH.title: CrewOutriderSplitCompanionPassengerTotal
recuNLergcz1MKiEH.desc: Crew, Companions, Beast, and Passengers - outriders counted as separate fighters and mounts

recucRF9W2aMo2Ukk.title: Crumbling Crew
recucRF9W2aMo2Ukk.desc: A group of shambling Undead were bound to your /comitatus/. They will fight for you until decaying completely.

recuchCmE2XpZbvDS.title: Favor of Irafons
recuchCmE2XpZbvDS.desc: The Saint of Roads looks after you and yours. You inexplicably find the best paths and headings.

recuuDVYLzpA2hHKF.title: Friends of the Cause
recuuDVYLzpA2hHKF.desc: An Abolitionist crew makes up for the lack of slave labor through sheer force of will and diligence.

recuvJXt5CJPENlRh.title: Perseverance
recuvJXt5CJPENlRh.desc: Hight Priest Dralis gave your companion a blessing of perseverance in the name of his God, Ahskul.

recv340RaNIhkbdIg.title: Regular Breaks
recv340RaNIhkbdIg.desc: Well-rested slaves and workers are the key to success according to the Oquo, and their work brigades take breaks in turns.

recvDUdAld2WDtymy.title: Blessing of Ahskul
recvDUdAld2WDtymy.desc: The Great King's divine power was granted to your /comitatus/, protecting your crew from wandering Undead.

recvb9BcdxSNZcjBb.title: Obedience
recvb9BcdxSNZcjBb.desc:
Represents how disciplined your slaves are. At low Obedience, they start to misbehave.
/Low Obedience penalizes, while high Obedience boosts Slave Workforce./

recwPPveBAvOmULkS.title: Insight
recwPPveBAvOmULkS.desc: Insight is gained by completing Stories, Exploring, and by revealing enough Codex entries. Use Insight to purchase Perks for your Leader or to raise the Prowess of your companions.

recwSbbWDgF6sWVuN.title: CrewOutriderSplitCompanionTotal
recwSbbWDgF6sWVuN.desc: Crew, Companions, and Beast - outriders counted as separate fighters and mounts

recwjPNM92MxFEGkS.title: March
recwjPNM92MxFEGkS.desc: March Movement Points (MMP; red) represent how far you can push your /comitatus/ after their MP runs out a given day.

recwka58OLrNsMstP.title: Spectral Curse
recwka58OLrNsMstP.desc: Upsetting the spirits of the dead is never a good idea. Your actions have angered them and their curse drains your thoughts as well as the courage of your crew.

recxAFZfQOPBkI0Mx.title: Blessing of Bal Ur Kaal
recxAFZfQOPBkI0Mx.desc: The Demon Prince's divine power was granted to your /comitatus/, making everyone more adept at scheming and persuading others.

recxAOMWNIWPx6uRd.title: Impervious Defense
recxAOMWNIWPx6uRd.desc: This type of defensive power can only be overcome by Enchanted Combat Strength.

recxQrFUIKco7xkqH.title: Believers of the Cause
recxQrFUIKco7xkqH.desc: An Abolitionist crew makes up for the lack of slave labor through sheer force of will and diligence.

recxk68IZn9dM0vyV.title: Greater Blessing of Sergorod
recxk68IZn9dM0vyV.desc: The Raging One's divine power was granted to your /comitatus/, giving your crew stamina, vigor, and vengeful wrath in combat.

recxra3yj0PDdyYCH.title: Supply
recxra3yj0PDdyYCH.desc: Indicates how long the currently available supplies of the /comitatus/ can feed it.

recxtr7ychIMG33s1.title: Spectral Meal
recxtr7ychIMG33s1.desc: Through Vorax's alchemy and cooking, the fighting crew is imbued with the macabre energies of the Underworld and are thus able to harm incorporeal beings.

recxwfmK99XhtQNjy.title: Beaten and Bruised
recxwfmK99XhtQNjy.desc: Your crew is badly hurt and will take several days to fully recover.

recxyqxPcNAxu3sPH.title: Fighter
recxyqxPcNAxu3sPH.desc:
Fighters can defend the /comitatus/ and attack others on your command. When fighters would be lost and you have no more fighters in the /comitatus/, you start losing scouts and workers.

/You need %poorguardcrew% to be poorly defended, %partialguardcrew% to be partially defended, and %fullguardcrew% to be fully defended./
recxyqxPcNAxu3sPH.altdesc: Fighters can defend the /comitatus/ and attack others on your command. When fighters would be lost and you have no more fighters in the /comitatus/, you start losing scouts and workers.

recy3TtnFkaMN3Ii4.title: Mosquito Infection
recy3TtnFkaMN3Ii4.desc: Bitten by infected mosquitoes, your crew now suffers from fevers and exhaustion.

recyBqhiuJ4I1hbpG.title: Perseverance
recyBqhiuJ4I1hbpG.desc: Hight Priest Dralis gave you a blessing of perseverance in the name of his God, Ahskul.

recyDPgNW1oGapPjT.title: Carpenters' Contacts
recyDPgNW1oGapPjT.desc: Knowing the right people in cities can get you better work opportunities even if these jobs are on the less dignified side.

recyFjJhDCpSLj1U4.title: Har-Tak-Gai Tribe
recyFjJhDCpSLj1U4.desc: Your forces are bolstered by the Har-Tak-Gai Kal-rish.

recyKL45RG9Lvlx9p.title: Blessing of Earth
recyKL45RG9Lvlx9p.desc: The Great Earth Spirit granted you protection and unnatural vigor. The earth also reveals its bounties more willingly.

recydHnpaQT5EUxHs.title: Crowded Camps
recydHnpaQT5EUxHs.desc: It is only natural that there is friction between crew members of a /comitatus/ of this size, which may cause an occasional drop in Morale.

recyhgmtGgf2AM28l.title: Industrious Enterprise
recyhgmtGgf2AM28l.desc: Your contacts at the Ratharnak Alliance provide you with valuable advice when it comes to activities related to industry and harvesting.

recynlbs3Qkfvngxc.title: Beast of burden
recynlbs3Qkfvngxc.desc:
Beasts of Burden haul cargo.
Type: %type%

/Each Beast carries %cargo% cargo./

recyvUaRDvCdoYzrW.title: March
recyvUaRDvCdoYzrW.desc: March Movement Points (MMP; red) represent how far you can push your /comitatus/ after their MP runs out a given day.

recywBuEsbMd9xfRW.title: Beast of Burden at your Outpost
recywBuEsbMd9xfRW.altitle: Beasts of Burden at your Outpost

reczkBPnlb7RxhTrF.title: Difference from the Optimal Number of Beasts at your Outpost

reczokzDPm3VOKduY.title: Destroy the Undead
reczokzDPm3VOKduY.desc: Blessed are those who aid the followers of Ahskul in their endless battle against rogue Undead.

rec3JEKFhWa5REIt1.title: +8 to All Resistances on All Companions

recDbsXejLEgHfXR9.title: Can die if severly wounded in Companion or Crew Combat

recaBDhGqaBcR3dd1.title: Posting additional guards cost 1 Vigor during camp.

reclqBWDpnamATNAi.title: Cover and Line of Sight penalties are halved for ranged skills.

recDHQfbrEcWONExE.desc:
A good night's sleep in the Mansio's rooms.
+1 Morale +1 Vigor +1 Nutrition

recURuwFlmBRN7Jhr.desc:
Sleep on the stable floor. At least it is free.
+1 Vigor

reclDoEXnTWcC6VVs.desc:
Enjoy all the hospitality this Mansio can offer.
+2 Morale +2 Nutrition

%guardposting%

rec3KrHbFI1xZe3co.title: Carpenters' Guild
rec3KrHbFI1xZe3co.desc: The Carpenters' Guild is one of the most powerful criminal syndicates of the Empire, growing rich on all kinds of illegal activities. They trace their history to craftsmen's unions in a long lost age when people knew what a carpenter truly was. Members like to think of themselves as highbrow entrepreneurs.

rec3V8PqyNH08aZpA.title: Abolitionists
rec3V8PqyNH08aZpA.desc: A secret organization sworn to put an end to slavery in the Empire, the Abolitionist movement has been around since way before the Calamity and is responsible for many slave revolts throughout the long centuries of the Fourth Age. Far from united, they operate in cells often without contact to other similar coteries.

rec9qVlgo8eghEmpi.title: Ratharnak Alliance
rec9qVlgo8eghEmpi.desc: A merchant charter born of the cooperation between the Green and Bronze Dragonlords, the Ratharnak are ruthless businessmen dealing in rare metals and clandestine plots in and outside of the Dragonlands. Many consider their cunning and aggressive ploys outright illicit but the Alliance has thus far avoided repercussions.

recAFyEzsKe4eYkbl.title: Cadmador
recAFyEzsKe4eYkbl.desc: Although Cadmador is officially a Trading House, its clandestine activities in other countries along with its militaristic structure reveal them for what they are: ruthless agents of the Black Dragonlord's will.

recNGDEWucEfHuFam.title: House Darius
recNGDEWucEfHuFam.desc: An Imperial Trading House, Darius was born of a single renowned family's mariner legacy and is now among the most powerful trade unions in the Realms. It has monopolies on military supplies and is the largest player in the slave trade in the Fourth Age, which earned them an unsavory reputation.

recVHSxTnZc47E3vc.title: The Church of Ahskul
recVHSxTnZc47E3vc.desc: Ahskul is the God of Death, and his Church is the largest of the Triumvirate, the Empire's official religion. Ahskulites look after the dead and hunt down the Undead — at least the ones unsanctioned by them. Most Necromancers have to live by the Ahskulites’ law when it comes to their morbid craft.

recXebkAy5YV61UOv.title: savages
recXebkAy5YV61UOv.desc: Not an actual faction, just a shared flag

recdOz37GyvKVwWUP.title: House Oquo
recdOz37GyvKVwWUP.desc: Founded half a century ago, the Imperial Trading House Oquo is considered an upstart by many but has proven to be just as powerful and ruthless as similar trade unions and organizations are. They have monopolies on obsidian and ivory, and their business keeps growing rapidly — to the horror of their competitors.

recdy5SaWaerSK2kV.title: The Church of Sergorod
recdy5SaWaerSK2kV.desc: Devoted servants of Sergorod, God of Vengeance, Curses, and Anger, the Church is one of the most powerful religious institutions of the Empire and a cornerstone of the official Imperial cult.
